intro: Cardiochlamys thorelii, commonly known as the Thorelli's heartleaf, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its unique morphology and habitat, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
